data.title: AI could be revolutionary, but don't ‘lose your diversification,' this wealth advisor says
data.description: AI's impact has yet to be fully realized and investors shouldn't put all of their eggs in one basket, according to Eric Diton of The Wealth Alliance.
data.author: Sean Conlon
data.keywords: Breaking News: Investing,iShares MSCI Emerging Markets ETF,Palantir Technologies Inc,Broadcom Inc,S&P 500 Index,NASDAQ Composite,Stock markets,Investment strategy,Dow Jones Industrial Average,business news
